SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) First Administration Version - In the last 2 weeks, how much of the time did you feel very confident and sure that you could deal with your illness?

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) First Administration Version - How often during the last 2 weeks did you feel you had complete control of your breathing problems?

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) First Administration Version - How often during the last 2 weeks have you felt embarrassed by your coughing or heavy breathing?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CRQ-SAS First Administration Version - Embarrassed by Coughing

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) First Administration Version - How much energy have you had in the last 2 weeks?

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format (CRQ-SAS) First Administration Version - How about fatigue? How tired have you felt over the last 2 weeks?

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CRQ01-Feel Relaxed and Free of Tension
